Posts.Title: Sense of Impending Doom mixed with Terror!! mshalto mshalto

Posts.Content: Nov 8, 2009 11:39AM treetoo wrote: Hi, Just to make things more confusing ;-) read these articles by David L Page, one of the top breast pathologists  for ALH www.breastconsults.com/reviews... You can have your slides sent to him for review. I was dx with ALH, and chose not to have surgery. If you are dx post menopause your risk may bit lower, there is something called Minimal ALH, jco.ascopubs.org/cgi/content/f... www.dslrf.org/breastcancer/con... BUT Look at all you risk factors Dense Breasts? When you had your children? Breast cancer in the family? Genetic testing results? Post Menopause Hormone use?  Radation Exposure at a young age to your chest? Overweight? Alcohol use? High Fat Diet? No Physical activity? Smoking? Nightwork? www.cancer.org/docroot/CRI/con... Keep us posted. Good Luck Tree
